channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brigitte Bardot: A Life in Pictures
item.description: The movies made the French actress a star, but photography sealed her stardom.

item.title: 'Bomb cyclone' forecasted to bring heavy snow, blizzard conditions and dangerous travel
item.description: A 'bomb cyclone' is intensifying severe winter weather for millions of people across the U.S. The system is expected to knock out power and disrupt ho...

item.title: Syrian Protests Over Lack of Security Leave 2 Dead
item.description: Days after a bombing at a mosque in a predominantly Alawite area, members of the religious minority in Syria demonstrated for better protections.

item.title: Pilot Is Dead After Helicopters Crash in New Jersey
item.description: Another pilot was in critical condition, according to the fire chief in Hammonton, N.J., where the crash took place.

item.title: Russia sends 3 Iranian satellites into orbit, report says
item.description: The report said that a Russian rocket sent the satellites on Sunday from a launchpad in eastern Russia.

item.title: Viral global TikToks: A twist on soccer, Tanzania's Charlie Chaplin, hope in Gaza
item.description: TikToks are everywhere (well, except countries like Australia and India, where they've been banned.) We talk to the creators of some of the year's mos...

item.title: Brigitte Bardot, sex goddess of cinema, has died
item.description: Legendary screen siren and animal rights activist Brigitte Bardot has died at age 91. The alluring former model starred in numerous movies, often play...

item.title: Memory loss: As AI gobbles up chips, prices for devices may rise
item.description: Demand for memory chips currently exceeds supply and there's very little chance of that changing any time soon. More chips for AI means less available...

item.title: Brigitte Bardot, French Movie Icon Who Renounced Stardom, Dies at 91
item.description: “And God Created Woman” made her a world-famous sex symbol in the 1950s. She later gave up acting to devote her life to animal welfare.

item.title: Map: 6.6-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Near Taiwan
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: Zelensky to Meet With Trump at Mar-a-Lago About Plan to End War With Russia
item.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine brings a revised 20-point peace proposal, as well as doubts about whether Russia is serious about pursuing pea...

item.title: Syrian Protests Over Lack of Security Leave 2 Dead
item.description: Days after a bombing at a mosque in a predominantly Alawite area, members of the religious minority in Syria demonstrated for better protections.

item.title: Opinionated Lists for an Overwhelming Year
item.description: As the year drew to a close, we reached out to Opinion columnists and contributors for personal lists.

item.title: Zero Hour for the Middle East
item.description: After more than a decade of wars, from Syria to Gaza, the Middle East is exhausted by conflict. Is it ready to find another way?

item.title: Guinea Goes to Polls as Ruling Junta Seeks Legitimacy
item.description: Whoever wins faces the daunting task of feeding the West African country’s poor and navigating the interests of global powers seeking critical mineral...
